uk.ac.ebi.ep.adapter.literature
Class CitexploreWSClientPool

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.ep.adapter.literature.CitexploreWSClientPool
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.pool.ObjectPool<uk.ac.ebi.biobabel.citations.CitexploreWSClient>
public class CitexploreWSClientPool
extends Object
implements org.apache.commons.pool.ObjectPool<uk.ac.ebi.biobabel.citations.CitexploreWSClient>

A pool of CiteXplore web services clients. Its size is configurable, and is both the number of clients in the pool and the maximum number of active ones.

Author:
rafa

public static void setSize(int size)
                    throws IllegalArgumentException,
                           Exception
Sets the size of the pool.

Parameters:
size -
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the passed size is lower than the number of current active clients.
Exception - in case of trouble manipulating the underlying pool.
